title: Designing Interaction Strategies to Enhance Preservice Science Teachers' Sense of Belonging in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Online Learning Platforms and Foundational Science Education Knowledge
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to foster a sense of belonging through meaningful relationships with peers and instructors in an online environment, with goals of improving science subject-matter expertise and well-being.

learning_goals: Learners confirm a sense of belonging by engaging in academic interactions with peer pre-service teachers at least twice weekly through online discussion forums
Learners achieve over 80% improvement in science education material development projects based on real-time/synchronous and asynchronous feedback provided by instructors
Learners maintain over 90% engagement when analyzing digital science materials using learner-content interaction tools (e.g., annotation features)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
